name: CHANNEL07
description:
My #LOWREZJAM 2016 entry

A simple old-school raycaster in 64x64 pixels.

CONTROLS:
Move: WASD
Look: Arrows / Mouse
Fire: Space / Left Click
Reload: R / Right Click
Fullscreen: F4
Pause/Release Mouse: Escape
Restart Level: F5

Please vote / give feedback here or on my twitter!

*OSX and Linux users require an installation of Love2D v0.10.1
